short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open PageSpeed Insights, DFP debugger, AMP validator, and Structured Data testing tool with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Website Analyser tools help to quickly run the 4 most basic analysing and debugging tools used for websites.

1. DFP or Double Click for Publishers to see the ad units being served and the corresponding details.
2. PageSpeed Insights
3. AMP validator
4. Structured Data testing

Please note that this plugin does not show the result in its UI nor does it run any algorithms. It simply opens the corresponding service with the webpage you are currently on. This is aimed at saving some time trying to remember the correct service URL or keywords.
